## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
march_madness_data <- read_csv("~/march-madness-predictor/data/Bio_185_March_Madness_Data.csv")
```

```{r}
march_madness_data %>%
  group_by(Winner) %>%
  count(Winner) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = "", y = n, fill = Winner)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1) +
  coord_polar("y", start=0)
```
